name: Cirkill (jhanson)
description:
In this retro arcade-style game, you must defend your rings from the evil spiky circles by using your inner circle to destroy them.

Use the mouse to control your circle.

This game was created in three hours for Trijam 135.  All assets were created by Jeff Hanson.  The music was made in BeepBox (beepbox.co), the sound effects in Bfxr (bfxr.net), and the game itself was programmed in GameMaker Studio 2 (yoyogames.com).
